Name: VR Fighter Jets War
About the game: This is a VR immersive flight shooting game with exquisite and gorgeous graphics. The overall environment is mainly based on aerial combat. High-fidelity sound effects provide players with a different shooting experience. You can experience fighting while sitting in a fighter jet, or you can choose to intervene outside the fighter jet. What the player has to do in the game is to drive the latest fighter and launch an offensive bombardment on the enemy. If your fighter jet crashes or is hit, the game is over. Enjoy your adventurous fighter jet combat. Instructions: Menu UI: Left/Right controller trigger button for selection; In game: Left thumbstick/touchpad move left and right to control the X axis to move left and right; Right thumbstick/touchpad control up and down and rotation; Left controller 'Y' / Menu button for acceleration; Right controller 'B' / Menu button for shooting; Left controller grip button for the first-person view (inside the aircraft); right controller grip button for the third-person view (outside the aircraft). Left controller trigger button for the menu, Right controller trigger button for selection.
